trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed from current location
trans-unit.target: Operazione non consentita dalla posizione corrente

trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN is successfully installed. You’re ready to start taking control of your online privacy.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN è stata installata correttamente. Ora sei pronto per prendere il controllo della tua privacy online.

trans-unit.source: A previous installation of Mozilla VPN exists at /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app. This installer will remove the previous installation prior to installing. Please back up any data before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN è già presente in /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app e verrà rimosso dal programma di installazione. Effettuare un salvataggio dei dati prima di procedere.

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN requires Mac OS X 10.6 or later.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN richiede Mac OS X 10.6 o successivo.

trans-unit.source: You will now be guided through the installation steps for the Mozilla VPN. Thank you for choosing your VPN from the trusted pioneer of internet privacy.
trans-unit.target: Verrai ora guidato attraverso i passaggi di installazione per Mozilla VPN. Grazie per aver scelto la tua VPN affidandoti al pioniere della privacy su Internet.
Fare clic su “Continua” per procedere con la configurazione.

trans-unit.note: This refers to the current IP address, i.e. "IP: Loading".

trans-unit.source: Unable to establish a connection at this time. We’re working hard to resolve the issue. Please try again shortly.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile stabilire una connessione in questo momento. Stiamo lavorando per risolvere il problema, riprova a breve.

trans-unit.note: Main text telling the user that we are asking for permission to send a crash report.
trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN app quit unexpectedly. Would you like to send a crash report to help fix the issue?
trans-unit.target: L’app Mozilla VPN si è chiusa in modo imprevisto. Inviare una segnalazione dell’arresto anomalo per aiutare a risolvere il problema?

trans-unit.note: User does not agree to send a crash report.
Label over description text section.
User agrees to send a crash report.
Example: "deviceName deviceDescription"
Accessibility description for current location of the VPN server
Select the Location of the VPN server
Message displayed to the user when the connection is unstable or missing, asking them to check their connection.
This refers to the user’s internet connection.

trans-unit.source: Turn on to protect your privacy
trans-unit.target: Attiva per proteggere la tua privacy

trans-unit.note: This refers to the user’s internet connection.
Switches from location 1 to location 2
The title for the list of cities.
This string is read by accessibility tools. %1 is the language name, %2 is the localized language name.

trans-unit.source: Get notified if a guest Wi-Fi portal is blocked due to VPN connection
trans-unit.target: Ricevi una notifica se un portale Wi-Fi è bloccato dalla connessione VPN

trans-unit.source: Get notified when the connection status changes
trans-unit.target: Ricevi una notifica quando cambia lo stato della connessione

trans-unit.source: Get notified when you successfully switched servers
trans-unit.target: Ricevi una notifica quando il cambio di server viene completato

trans-unit.source: Get notified if you connect to an unsecured Wi-Fi network
trans-unit.target: Ricevi una notifica quando ti connetti a una rete Wi-Fi non protetta

trans-unit.note: Button label
Search bar placeholder text

trans-unit.source: Your connection will not be secure while you update.
trans-unit.target: La connessione non sarà sicura durante l’aggiornamento.

trans-unit.source: Please update the app before you continue to use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Aggiornare l’app prima di continuare a utilizzare la VPN

trans-unit.source: We detected and fixed a serious bug. You must update your app.
trans-unit.target: Abbiamo identificato e risolto un problema grave. È necessario aggiornare l’app.

trans-unit.note: A notification channel; so the user can subscribe to "General Notifications"
Accessible name for a button. %1 is the version number of the VPN client.
Refers to the installed version. For example: 'Release Version: 1.23'

Used by screen readers to explain to users which item they are currently focused on, and how many items there are total in a group. For example, given a list with 15 items. If a user selects the 3rd item, we want the screen reader to read out "3 of 15". The %1 represents the index of the currently focused item by the screen reader. The %2 represents the total number of items in the group.
Used by screen reader to indicate that a user action selected an item.

Used by screen readers to denote that a particular item is currently selected. For example, given a segmented control with 2 items, where the first item is currently selected. We want the screen reader to read out "Selected, <item name>". The %1 represents the name of the selected item.

trans-unit.target: Ignora la VPN per traffico specifico

trans-unit.note: Make sure it's clear that this will allow major features (like messaging apps) to function, but potentially at the expense of some security.
trans-unit.source: Allow RCS/MMS messaging, Apple features like CarPlay and AirDrop, and connections to local devices. May reduce network security.
trans-unit.target: Consenti messaggi RCS/MMS, funzionalità Apple come CarPlay e AirDrop e connessioni a dispositivi locali. Questo potrebbe ridurre la sicurezza della rete.

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to change this setting
trans-unit.target: La VPN deve essere disattivata per modificare questa impostazione

trans-unit.source: You must turn off your VPN in order to see the portal, and turn it back on once you have logged in.
trans-unit.target: È necessario disattivare la VPN per visualizzare il portale e riattivarla dopo aver effettuato l’accesso.

trans-unit.source: You can turn on your VPN once you have gained internet access by logging in to the portal.
trans-unit.target: È possibile attivare la VPN dopo aver eseguito l’accesso al portale e una volta che la connessione a Internet è attiva.

trans-unit.source: A captive portal is when the guest Wi-Fi you are using requires you to log in to get internet access.
trans-unit.target: Un captive portal è una pagina del Wi-Fi per ospiti che stai utilizzando e richiede l’accesso tramite credenziali per potersi connettere a Internet.

trans-unit.note: Accessible label for the button that shows the IP info panel when clicked.

trans-unit.source: Looks like there was an unexpected error while trying to connect. Please try again or check your connection.
trans-unit.target: Sembra che si sia verificato un errore imprevisto durante il tentativo di connessione. Riprova o verifica la connessione a Internet.

trans-unit.note: Exit server IP label for IPV4. IP is the abbreviation for Internet Procol. This is followed by the user’s IPv4 address.
Exit server IP label for IPv6. IPv6 is the abbreviation for Internet Procol version 6. This is followed by the user’s IPv6 address.
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for high speedtest results
Bits per second
Gigabits per second
Kilobits per second
Megabits per second
Latency of the connection
Terabits per second
Label for the upload benchmark shown in the speed test view.
Headline for a list of things that the current connection is capable of.
trans-unit.source: At your current speed, here’s what your device is optimized for:
trans-unit.target: Alla tua velocità attuale, il tuo dispositivo è ottimizzato per:

trans-unit.note: Headline for a list of suggestions for troubleshooting the current connection.
trans-unit.source: It looks like the connection to this server location is a bit slow, you can try:
trans-unit.target: Sembra che la connessione al server per questa posizione sia un po’ lenta, puoi provare a:

trans-unit.note: Shown to the user while waiting for the connection speed test results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
This is a bullet item in the connection section for medium speedtest results
Title for the connection metrics view.
Accessible label for the button to restart the speed test upon its completion.
Accessible label for the button that opens the speed test view and initiates a speed test
This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section
This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section for multi-hop connections
trans-unit.source: Switching back to a single-hop connection

trans-unit.note: This is a bullet item in the connection troubleshooting section
This is a description for a checkbox on the crash reporter dialog.
trans-unit.source: Don’t show this again. Autosend crash reports to Mozilla.
trans-unit.target: Non mostrare di nuovo. Invia automaticamente segnalazioni di arresto anomalo a Mozilla.

trans-unit.note: Main window title
Label at the top of the "Devices" setting screen indicating the number of devices registered to the users account (1st arg) vs the max limit of devices available for their account (2nd arg)
Description of the "device limit" view describing why the device has not yet been added to the list of active devices (because we are at the device limit)
trans-unit.source: You’re using VPN on 5 devices. To add another device, please remove one.
trans-unit.target: Stai già utilizzando la VPN su 5 dispositivi. Per aggiungere un altro dispositivo, è necessario rimuoverne uno.

trans-unit.note: Title of the "device limit" view stating that the device has not yet been added to the list of active devices (because we are at the device limit)
Device list item description for a device added days ago. %1 is the number of days.
Device list item description for a device added a few hours ago. %1 is the number of hours.
Device list item description for a device added less than 1 hour ago
trans-unit.source: Added less than an hour ago

trans-unit.note: Device list item description for the current device
Label used for accessibility on the button to remove a device. %1 is the name of the device.
Description for the Remove Device popup. %1 is the name of the device being removed. The name is displayed on purpose on a new line."
trans-unit.source: Please confirm you would like to remove %1.

trans-unit.note: Label for the primary button for the Remove Device poup
Title for the Remove Device popup
Title for "Removing device" screen
Title for the menu bar when viewing the devices or device limit pages

trans-unit.source: Using these privacy features will override your custom DNS.
trans-unit.target: L’utilizzo di queste funzioni per la privacy sovrascriverà il tuo DNS personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: Using a custom DNS will override your preferences in the privacy features page.
trans-unit.target: L’utilizzo di un DNS personalizzato sovrascriverà le tue preferenze nella pagina delle funzioni per la privacy.
Sovrascrivere le funzioni per la privacy?

trans-unit.note: This string appears above the 'Sign up' button on mobile onboarding views
trans-unit.source: Sign up to start your 7-day free trial.
trans-unit.target: Registrati per iniziare la tua prova gratuita di 7 giorni.

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again. Visit our help center below to learn how to troubleshoot this issue or contact support.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore imprevisto, riprova. Consulta il nostro centro assistenza per scoprire come risolvere questo problema o contattare l’assistenza.

trans-unit.note: Button label
Label for a clickable item in the Get-Help view
Accessible label for clear button
Accessible label for close button
Action used in the context of an expandable/collapsible card component
Label for button used to proceed with an action
Confirmation banner displayed after clicking a button to copy something.
Accessible button label
Label for button used in intro modals to discover new features.
Action used in the context of an expandable/collapsible card component
Label for a button used to begin something / proceed
Label for button used in intro modals to return to the app.
Action taken that will help the user
Label for link to allow the user to learn more about a topic
Label for button used to proceed
Status alert text
Label for button used to not proceed with an action
Label for button to paste value from clipboard into input
Link title
Fallback string for users who have not specified a Display Name.
Body label for the devices help sheet
trans-unit.source: Adding a new device to your subscription is easy: just download and log in to Mozilla VPN on that device.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere un nuovo dispositivo al tuo abbonamento è facile: scarica l’app e accedi a Mozilla VPN da quel dispositivo.

trans-unit.note: Body label for the devices help sheet
trans-unit.source: To remove one of your added devices, select “Edit” on this screen and use the trash icon to remove the device you no longer want to use Mozilla VPN on.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere uno dei dispositivi aggiunti, seleziona “Modifica” in questa schermata e utilizza l’icona del cestino per rimuovere il dispositivo su cui non desideri più utilizzare Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.note: Header label for the devices help sheet
Title label for the devices help sheet
Body text for the custom dns help sheet
trans-unit.source: Whenever you connect to a website, a DNS (domain name system) first turns the domain name (e.g. www.mozilla.org) into an IP address that allows your internet traffic to reach that destination.
trans-unit.target: Ogni volta che ti connetti a un sito web, un DNS (domain name system) trasforma il nome di dominio (ad es. www.mozilla.org) in un indirizzo IP che consente al tuo traffico internet di raggiungere quella destinazione.

trans-unit.note: Body text for the custom dns help sheet
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN allows you to choose a custom DNS server if you prefer. If you use one, you won’t be able to use other privacy features in the VPN like tracker blocking.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN ti consente di scegliere un server DNS personalizzato. Se ne utilizzi uno, non sarai in grado di utilizzare altre funzionalità per la privacy incluse nella VPN, come il blocco degli elementi traccianti.

trans-unit.note: Header label for the custom dns help sheet
Title label for the custom dns help sheet
Body label for the excluded apps help sheet
trans-unit.source: Excluded apps let you turn off VPN protection for specific apps, without turning off VPN protection for your entire device.
trans-unit.target: La sezione “App escluse” ti consente di disattivare la protezione VPN per specifiche app, senza disattivare la protezione VPN per l’intero dispositivo.

trans-unit.note: Body label for the excluded apps help sheet
trans-unit.source: When you exclude an app, it will have access to your IP address and approximate location.
trans-unit.target: Quando escludi un’app, questa avrà accesso al tuo indirizzo IP e alla tua posizione approssimativa.

trans-unit.note: Body label for the excluded apps help sheet
trans-unit.source: You can use the settings under Settings > Privacy features to block ads, block trackers, and block malware, even on excluded apps.
trans-unit.target: Puoi utilizzare le opzioni disponibili in Impostazioni > Funzioni per la privacy per bloccare pubblicità, elementi traccianti e bloccare malware, anche per le app escluse.

trans-unit.note: Label for button that opens the "Privacy features" view from the excluded apps help sheet
Header label for the excluded apps help sheet
trans-unit.target: Che cosa sono le app escluse?

trans-unit.note: Title label for the excluded apps help sheet
Body label for the location selection help sheet
trans-unit.source: If you want maximum speed and reliability, choose one of the recommended locations in the “Single-hop” toggle. We’ve sorted them based on expected performance.
trans-unit.target: Se desideri la massima velocità e affidabilità, scegli una delle posizioni consigliate nella sezione “Single-hop”. Sono ordinate in base alle prestazioni previste.

trans-unit.note: Body label for the location selection help sheet
trans-unit.source: If you want to add more privacy, switch to “Multi-hop” and add an additional server location. Multi-hop VPN routes your traffic through two server locations instead of one for extra security and privacy. This may also slow down your connection a bit.
trans-unit.target: Se vuoi un’ulteriore protezione per la tua privacy, passa a “Multi-hop” e aggiungi un altro server. La VPN multi-hop instrada il tuo traffico attraverso due posizioni invece di una, garantendo maggiore sicurezza e privacy. È importante notare che questo potrebbe rallentare leggermente la connessione.

trans-unit.note: Header label for the location selection help sheet
Title label for the location selection help sheet
Body label for the privacy features help sheet
trans-unit.source: Privacy features give you greater control over the types of content you see, helping you stay safe online.
trans-unit.target: Le funzioni per la privacy ti offrono un maggiore controllo sui tipi di contenuti che vedi, aiutandoti a rimanere al sicuro quando sei online.

trans-unit.note: Body label for the privacy features help sheet
trans-unit.source: If you activate these features, they’ll overwrite any custom DNS you’re using. These protections are not a substitute for taking other security precautions — for example, while blocking malware you should still avoid downloading attachments in strange emails.
trans-unit.target: Se attivi queste funzioni, eventuali DNS personalizzati che stai utilizzando verranno sovrascritti. Queste protezioni non sostituiscono l’adozione di altre precauzioni di sicurezza: ad esempio, anche se attivi il blocco dei malware dovresti comunque evitare di scaricare allegati in strani messaggi di posta elettronica.

trans-unit.note: Header label for the privacy features help sheet
trans-unit.source: What can privacy features do for me?
trans-unit.target: Come possono aiutarmi le funzioni per la privacy?

trans-unit.note: Title label for the privacy features help sheet
Button a user clicks after updating their Mozilla account settings so that they can re-attempt sign-in
This is a label displayed on the password creation screen.
User has requested to send a new email containing the 6-digit pin to confirm their email address.
trans-unit.source: We’ve resent your code to your email.
trans-unit.target: Ti abbiamo inviato nuovamente il codice via email.

trans-unit.note: User has been sent a verification email containing a code.
trans-unit.source: Open your email and enter the verification code that was sent.
trans-unit.target: Controlla la tua email e inserisci il codice di verifica che ti è stato inviato.

trans-unit.source: Enter your email address to continue using Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Inserisci il tuo indirizzo email per continuare a utilizzare Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: User message prompting user to finish creating their account to use Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.source: Finish creating your Mozilla account to continue to Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Completa la creazione del tuo account Mozilla per continuare su Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.note: Tooltip label for the eye icon in password input
Non-op text that informs user about how Mozilla will not sell it to a third party.
trans-unit.source: We only use your email to create your account or sign in. We will never sell it to a third party.
trans-unit.target: Utilizziamo la tua email solo per creare il tuo account o per consentirti l’accesso. Non la venderemo mai a terzi.

trans-unit.note: User provided did not provide a correct security code.
Generic message for when user submits incorrect email.
User is providing us an email that is not formatted correctly. Ex. jsmith&gmail.com
trans-unit.source: Email format not supported. Please try again with a different email
trans-unit.target: Formato email non supportato. Riprova con un’altra email

trans-unit.note: User has submitted an invalid password.
This is a hint for the user - they must provide a password with at least 8 characters
This is a hint for the user - password they provide must not be a common password. Ex. password.
trans-unit.source: Must not be a common password
trans-unit.target: Non deve essere una password di uso comune

trans-unit.note: This is a hint for the user - they must provide a password that does not match their email.
trans-unit.source: Must not be your email address
trans-unit.target: Deve essere diversa dal tuo indirizzo email

trans-unit.note: Headline on loading screen
App screen that informs the user there was an error signing them in - this is the message.
trans-unit.source: Primary account email required for sign-in
trans-unit.target: Per accedere è necessario utilizzare l’indirizzo email principale

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error sending them their verification code email - this is the message.
trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to send you a verification code.
trans-unit.target: Siamo spiacenti, non è stato possibile inviarti un codice di verifica.

trans-unit.note: App screen that informs the user there was an error sending them their verification code email - this is the title.
Checkbox label for users to opt in, when creating an account, to receive product update emails from Firefox.
trans-unit.source: I’d like to receive product update emails from Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Desidero ricevere email da Firefox relative agli aggiornamenti dei prodotti.

trans-unit.source: To continue, please confirm with your Mozilla account password.
trans-unit.target: Per continuare, conferma con la password del tuo account Mozilla.

trans-unit.note: This link allows the user to request for another 6-digit verification code to be sent to their email.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for TOTP 6-digit verification code.
Label for input asking user for their security code.
User is asked for a security code from their authentication app for verification.
trans-unit.source: Open your authentication app and enter the security code it provides.
trans-unit.target: Apri l’app di autenticazione e inserisci il codice di verifica ottenuto.

trans-unit.note: Title for app screen asking user for their security code.
Placeholder text for input element asking user for 6-digit verification code from their email.
Tooltip label for the eye icon in password input
User has been unable to sign in correctly, they have a cool down period of 1 minute until they can try again.
trans-unit.source: You’ve made too many attempts to sign in. You won’t be able to try again with this account for 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: Hai effettuato troppi tentativi di accesso. Non potrai riprovare con questo account per 1 minuto.

trans-unit.note: User has been unable to sign in correctly, they have a cool down period of 15 minutes until they can try again.
trans-unit.source: You’ve made too many attempts to sign in. You won’t be able to try again with this account for 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Hai effettuato troppi tentativi di accesso. Non potrai riprovare con questo account per 15 minuti.

trans-unit.source: Continue to Mozilla VPN by signing in with your Mozilla account
trans-unit.target: Continua su Mozilla VPN effettuando l’accesso con il tuo account Mozilla

trans-unit.note: User has tried to log in using an SSO-linked account that does not have a password. The user needs to log in to their Mozilla Account to set a password before proceeding. This is the header on the error screen.
User has tried to log in using an SSO-linked account that does not have a password. The user needs to log in to their Mozilla Account to set a password before proceeding.
trans-unit.source: To finish setting up your Mozilla account, create a password in your account settings:
trans-unit.target: Per completare la configurazione del tuo account Mozilla, crea una password nelle impostazioni del tuo account:

trans-unit.note: User has tried to log in using an SSO-linked account that does not have a password. The user needs to log in to their Mozilla Account to set a password before proceeding. Do not remove or translate the markup '<a href="open-account">'.
trans-unit.source: 1. Go to Create password in your Mozilla account settings.
trans-unit.target: 1. Vai a Crea password nelle impostazioni del tuo account Mozilla.

trans-unit.note: User has tried to log in using an SSO-linked account that does not have a password. The user needs to log in to their Mozilla Account to set a password before proceeding.
User has tried to log in using an SSO-linked account that does not have a password. The user needs to log in to their Mozilla Account to set a password before proceeding.
trans-unit.source: When your password is created, return to this screen and continue to sign in to Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Una volta creata la password, torna in questa schermata e completa l’accesso a Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.note: User has tried to log into a Mozilla account before setting their password, which happens after email verification. This is the header on the error screen.
User has tried to log into a Mozilla account before setting their password, which happens after email verification. %1 is the email address associated with the account.
trans-unit.source: We’ve sent an email to %1 with the verification link. Please follow the directions to set up your password and finish setting up your account.
trans-unit.target: Abbiamo inviato un’email a %1 con il link di verifica. Segui le istruzioni per impostare la password e completare la configurazione del tuo account.

trans-unit.note: Do not remove or translate the markup '', '', ''.
trans-unit.source: By continuing, you agree to the Terms of Service and the Privacy Notice.
trans-unit.target: Proseguendo, confermi di accettare le nostre condizioni di utilizzo del servizio e l’informativa sulla privacy.

trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input element asking user for 8-digit verification code from their email.
Headline on loading screen
trans-unit.source: Waiting for sign in and subscription confirmation…
trans-unit.target: In attesa dell’accesso e della conferma dell’abbonamento…

trans-unit.note: A badge shown in a message signifying that this is an important message
An action to delete a message from the users inbox
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains information about a Firefox browser extension
A badge shown in a message signifying an update to the app is available
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains information about the user's subscription
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains a survey
A badge shown in a message signifying that this is a warning message
A badge shown in a message signifying that this message contains information about what is new in the product
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to account issues.

trans-unit.source: When you submit, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data with your email to help our support team understand your issue.
trans-unit.target: Con l’invio di questo modulo, Mozilla VPN raccoglierà dati tecnici e di interazione insieme al tuo indirizzo email per aiutare il team di supporto a identificare il problema.

trans-unit.note: A user trying to submit feedback will use this dropdown to select the general topic related to the feedback.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to requesting new features.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to issues not covered under the other categories.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to payment and billing.

trans-unit.target: Informativa sulla privacy di Mozilla VPN
Errore durante l’invio della richiesta di supporto

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore imprevisto, riprova.

trans-unit.source: How can we help you with Mozilla VPN?
trans-unit.target: Come possiamo aiutarti con Mozilla VPN?

trans-unit.note: The %1 represents the email used to complete the form
trans-unit.source: Our support team will contact you at %1 once we’ve been able to look at your issue.
trans-unit.target: Il nostro team di supporto ti contatterà all’indirizzo %1 non appena avremo esaminato il tuo problema.

trans-unit.note: A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to technical issues.
Placeholder text for a search field that can be used to search through a list of languages
the description for the system lagnague radio button
trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will use the default system language.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN utilizzerà la lingua predefinita del sistema.

trans-unit.note: the title for the system language radio button

trans-unit.source: Access Apple CarPlay, AirDrop, AirPlay and local network devices like printers. The VPN must be off to edit this setting.
trans-unit.target: Accedi ad Apple CarPlay, AirDrop, AirPlay e ai dispositivi di rete locali come le stampanti. La VPN deve essere disattivata per modificare questa impostazione.

trans-unit.source: Access Apple CarPlay, AirDrop, AirPlay and local network devices like printers.
trans-unit.target: Accedi a Apple CarPlay, AirDrop, AirPlay e ai dispositivi di rete locali come le stampanti.

trans-unit.source: A safe, reliable and fast VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Una VPN sicura, affidabile e veloce. Realizzata dagli autori di Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Your subscription is linked to another Mozilla account. You may need to sign in with a different email address.
trans-unit.target: Il tuo abbonamento è associato a un altro account Mozilla. Potrebbe essere necessario accedere con un indirizzo email diverso.

trans-unit.source: Visit our help center to learn more about managing your subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Visita il nostro centro di assistenza per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione del tuo abbonamento.

trans-unit.note: Accessible label that is used for recent multi-hop server connections. “%1” represents the entry server and “%2” the exit server.
This is alt text for an arrow showing the multi-hop route between servers. e.g. Atlanta TO Copenhagen

trans-unit.source: Exit location represents your main VPN server.
trans-unit.target: Il server di uscita è il tuo server VPN principale.

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: Nessun risultato. Prova con termini diversi

trans-unit.note: Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the home screen
Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the messages inbox screen
Label for the tab on the navigation bar that takes the user to the settings screen

trans-unit.source: To continue subscribing, please sign in to your Google Account
trans-unit.target: Per procedere con la sottoscrizione dell’abbonamento, accedi con il tuo account Google

trans-unit.note: %1 is the name of the city the VPN is connected to.
%1 is the name of the city the VPN disconnected from.
%1 is the name of the exit server, %2 is the name of the entry server.
%1 is the name of the exit server, %2 is the name of the entry server.
%1 is the name of the initial server, %2 is the name of the destination server.

trans-unit.target: La VPN è passata a un altro server

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to requires action. Click to turn off VPN to see the portal.
trans-unit.target: La rete Wi-Fi per ospiti a cui sei connesso richiede attenzione. Fai clic per disattivare la VPN e visualizzare il portale.

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to may not be secure. Click to turn on VPN to secure your device.
trans-unit.target: La rete Wi-Fi per ospiti a cui sei connesso potrebbe non essere sicura. Fai clic per attivare la VPN e proteggere il dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, something went wrong with your VPN connection.
trans-unit.target: Siamo spiacenti, si è verificato un problema con la connessione VPN.

trans-unit.source: Your Mozilla VPN subscription cannot be found. Please open the app to resolve this subscription issue.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile trovare il tuo abbonamento a Mozilla VPN. Apri l’app per risolvere il problema.

trans-unit.source: Wi-Fi network is not secure. Click here to turn on VPN and secure your device.
trans-unit.target: La rete Wi-Fi non è sicura. Fai clic qui per attivare la VPN e proteggere il tuo dispositivo.

trans-unit.note: %1 is the Wi-Fi network name
trans-unit.source: %1 is not secure. Click here to turn on VPN and secure your device.
trans-unit.target: %1 non è sicura. Fai clic qui per attivare la VPN e proteggere il tuo dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Help us improve Mozilla VPN by sharing crash reports, diagnostics, and product usage data. We never collect data about your online activity while using the VPN.
trans-unit.target: Aiutaci a migliorare Mozilla VPN condividendo segnalazioni di arresto anomalo, dati diagnostici e sull’utilizzo del prodotto. Non raccogliamo mai dati sulla tua attività online durante l’utilizzo della VPN.
Informativa sulla privacy di Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: To install the VPN on another tablet or mobile device, scan the QR code.
trans-unit.target: Per installare la VPN su un altro tablet o dispositivo mobile, scansiona il codice QR.

trans-unit.source: To install the VPN on another tablet or mobile device, scan the QR code. To install on a desktop computer, visit the Download page on the Mozilla VPN website.
trans-unit.target: Per installare la VPN su un altro tablet o dispositivo mobile, scansiona il codice QR. Per eseguire l’installazione su un computer desktop, visita la pagina Download sul sito web di Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.source: Install Mozilla VPN on up to 5 devices
trans-unit.target: Installa Mozilla VPN su un massimo di 5 dispositivi

trans-unit.source: QR Code that links to the Mozilla VPN product page on the Google Play Store
trans-unit.target: Codice QR che rimanda alla pagina del prodotto Mozilla VPN sul Google Play Store

trans-unit.source: QR Code that links to the Mozilla VPN product page on the iOS App Store
trans-unit.target: Codice QR che rimanda alla pagina del prodotto Mozilla VPN nell’iOS App Store

trans-unit.source: You can set Mozilla VPN to protect you from ads, trackers, and malware. Plus, customize your protection for specific apps.
trans-unit.target: Puoi impostare Mozilla VPN per proteggerti da pubblicità, elementi traccianti e malware. Inoltre, puoi personalizzare la protezione per specifiche app.

trans-unit.source: Protecting yourself is simple: tap to connect to the VPN and you’re ready to browse safely. Mozilla VPN will start automatically for seamless protection.
trans-unit.target: Proteggersi è semplice: tocca per connetterti alla VPN e sei pronto per navigare in sicurezza. Mozilla VPN si avvierà automaticamente per una protezione senza problemi.

trans-unit.source: With more than 500 servers in 60 cities around the world, Mozilla VPN protects your data, browsing activity, and your true location from network spies.
trans-unit.target: Con oltre 500 server in 60 città in tutto il mondo, Mozilla VPN protegge i tuoi dati, le tue attività di navigazione e la tua posizione reale da chi cerca di spiarti sulla rete.

trans-unit.source: Use these features for more protection. They may cause issues on some sites, so you can turn them off anytime in settings.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza queste funzioni per una maggiore protezione. Potrebbero causare problemi su alcuni siti, per questo puoi disattivarle in qualsiasi momento nelle impostazioni.

trans-unit.note: Accessibility read out for completed steps in the step progress bar. %1 is the name of the step. %2 is the index of the current step. %3 is the total number of steps.
trans-unit.source: Onboarding step “%1” (%2 of %3). Select to go back to this step.
trans-unit.target: Fase dell’introduzione “%1” (%2 di %3). Selezionare per tornare a questo passaggio.

trans-unit.note: Accessibility read out for the current step in the step progress bar. %1 is the name of the step. %2 is the index of the current step. %3 is the total number of steps.
trans-unit.source: Onboarding step “%1” (%2 of %3). You are currently on this step.
trans-unit.target: Fase dell’introduzione “%1” (%2 di %3). Attualmente sei su questo passaggio.

trans-unit.note: Accessibility read out for incomplete future steps in the step progress bar. %1 is the name of the step. %2 is the index of the current step. %3 is the total number of steps.
Label for onboarding progress bar step where users find out how to install Mozilla VPN on other devices
Label for onboarding progress bar step where users can grant permission to create a VPN configuration with the system
Label for onboarding progress bar step where users can select to enable data collection
Label for onboarding progress bar step where users can select to enable various privacy settings
Label for onboarding progress bar step where users can select to enable VPN startup on device boot

trans-unit.source: Launch the VPN whenever you start your device. We’ll automatically reconnect you to the same server location you last used.
trans-unit.target: Apri la VPN ogni volta che avvii il tuo dispositivo. Ti ricollegheremo automaticamente allo stesso server utilizzato la volta precedente.

trans-unit.source: Your mobile device will now ask you to allow Mozilla VPN to create a connection. Please allow this so that the VPN works correctly on your device.
trans-unit.target: Il dispositivo mobile ti chiederà ora di consentire a Mozilla VPN di creare una connessione. Consenti questa operazione in modo che la VPN funzioni correttamente sul tuo dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to create a VPN connection
trans-unit.target: Consenti a Mozilla VPN di creare una connessione VPN

trans-unit.note: Paragraph requesting the user to allow the VPN to run in the background.
trans-unit.source: To use Mozilla VPN, please allow it to run in the background.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare Mozilla VPN, consenti l’esecuzione in background.

trans-unit.note: Paragraph explaining how to enable the VPN to run in the background.
trans-unit.source: In order to do this, please click the button below to open the Login Items of your System Preferences, and enable Allow in the background for Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Per farlo, fai clic sul pulsante sottostante per aprire gli Elementi login nelle Impostazioni di Sistema e attiva Consenti in background per Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.note: Label for the button that opens the login items settings page
Title of the screen directing macOS users to allow the VPN to run in background
trans-unit.source: Allow VPN to run in background
trans-unit.target: Consenti alla VPN di funzionare in background

trans-unit.source: A fast, secure and easy to use VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Una VPN veloce, sicura e facile da utilizzare. Realizzata dagli autori di Firefox.

trans-unit.note: Appears on the in-app purchase view beside a subscription plan. "%1" is replaced by the percentage amount saved when selecting that plan
Button label
%1 is replaced by the subscription duration in months. %2 is replaced by the total subscription cost.

trans-unit.source: Please continue subscribing in your browser…
trans-unit.target: Continua la procedura di abbonamento nel browser…

trans-unit.note: %1 is the user’s email address.
trans-unit.source: We couldn’t find a subscription for %1. Subscribe now to protect your connection.
trans-unit.target: Non è stato possibile trovare un abbonamento per %1. Abbonati adesso per proteggere la tua connessione.

trans-unit.note: Body content of the screen where users go to reset the VPN to factory settings
trans-unit.source: This will reset all VPN settings, including:
trans-unit.target: Questa operazione ripristinerà tutte le impostazioni della VPN, inclusi:

trans-unit.note: Body content of the screen where users go to reset the VPN to factory settings
trans-unit.source: Resetting the VPN will sign you out, but your account will not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Ripristinando le impostazioni della VPN verrai disconnesso, ma il tuo account non verrà eliminato.

trans-unit.note: Body of the modal where users can confirm they want to restore back to factory settings
trans-unit.source: Reset Mozilla VPN settings? This can’t be undone.
trans-unit.target: Ripristinare le impostazioni di Mozilla VPN? Questa operazione non può essere annullata.

trans-unit.note: Label for button that finalizes a restore to factory settings
Title of the modal where users can confirm they want to restore back to factory settings
Item in a bulleted list denoting what will be deleted if the user opts to factory reset the client
Label for button that initiates a restore to factory settings
Label for button that takes the user to the factory reset flow
Title of the screen where users go to reset the VPN to factory settings

trans-unit.source: Sorry, we are unable to connect your Mozilla account to a current subscription. Please try again or contact our support team for further assistance.
trans-unit.target: Siamo spiacenti, non è stato possibile collegare il tuo account Mozilla all’abbonamento attuale. Riprova o contatta il nostro team di supporto per ulteriore assistenza.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, we were unable to confirm your subscription. Please try again or contact our support team for help.
trans-unit.target: Siamo spiacenti, non è stato possibile confermare il tuo abbonamento. Riprova o contatta il nostro team di supporto per assistenza.

trans-unit.source: Another Mozilla account has already subscribed using this Apple ID. Please sign out and try again or contact our support team for help.
trans-unit.target: Un altro account Mozilla è già abbonato con questo ID Apple. Effettua la disconnessione e riprova o contatta il nostro team di supporto per assistenza.

trans-unit.source: This server location is temporarily unavailable. Choose a new location.
trans-unit.target: Il server per questa posizione è temporaneamente non disponibile. Scegli una nuova posizione.

trans-unit.source: This server location is temporarily unavailable. Please open the app to choose a new location.
trans-unit.target: Il server per questa posizione è temporaneamente non disponibile. Apri l’app per scegliere una nuova posizione.

trans-unit.source: The server has been blocked. Check your firewall settings.
trans-unit.target: Il server è stato bloccato. Controlla le impostazioni del firewall.

trans-unit.source: Get notified when connecting to a server location failed
trans-unit.target: Ricevi una notifica quando non è possibile connettersi al server per la posizione scelta

trans-unit.note: Label for recommended server list when the list is empty
trans-unit.source: To see recommended server locations, turn off the VPN.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare le posizioni consigliate dei server, disattivare la VPN.

trans-unit.note: Accessible label for the button that triggers a refresh of the recommended servers list.

The time (or in extremely rare circumstances, the date, day of the week, or "yesterday") which the recommended servers list was last updated and instructions to re-enable the refresh button. Argument is the time or date/day
trans-unit.source: Last updated: %1. To update this list please disconnect from the VPN.
trans-unit.target: Ultimo aggiornamento: %1. Per aggiornare questo elenco disconnettersi dalla VPN.

trans-unit.note: The time (or in extremely rare circumstances, the date, day of the week, or "yesterday") which the recommended servers list was last updated. Argument is the time or date/day
Loading string while recommended servers are being calculated. Argument is the percentage of completion as an integer (i.e. 25)

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: Nessun risultato. Prova con un’altra ricerca

trans-unit.note: Button label that reads out a city name whose connection is good. Argument is the city name.
Button label that reads out a city name whose connection is moderate. Argument is the city name.
Button label that reads out a city name whose connection is unavailable. Argument is the city name.
Button label that reads out a city name whose connection is poor. Argument is the city name.
Label for the “all” servers tab
Label for the “recommended” servers tab
Button label to clear all apps from the exclusions list
Appearance refers to the app theming (dark mode / light mode)
Automatic switching for dark mode/light mode, based on the system’s setting
Dark as in "dark mode theme"
Light as in "light mode theme"
This is the description of a checkbox option to allow the app to send crash reports without a user prompt
trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to automatically send crash reports to help fix unexpected crashes
trans-unit.target: Consenti a Mozilla VPN di inviare automaticamente segnalazioni di arresto anomalo per aiutare nella risoluzione del problema

trans-unit.source: Resolve websites using a custom DNS
trans-unit.target: Risolvi i nomi di dominio dei siti web utilizzando un DNS personalizzato

trans-unit.source: Invalid DNS, please try a new one
trans-unit.target: DNS non valido, provane un altro

trans-unit.source: Changing these settings will cause the VPN to disconnect and reconnect automatically.
trans-unit.target: La modifica di queste impostazioni comporta la disconnessione e la riconnessione automatica della VPN.

trans-unit.source: Resolve websites using Mozilla VPN’s standard DNS
trans-unit.target: Risolvi i nomi di dominio dei siti web utilizzando il DNS standard di Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: These options may cause some websites to break or not display content correctly.
trans-unit.target: Queste opzioni possono causare il malfunzionamento o la mancata visualizzazione di contenuti in alcuni siti web.

trans-unit.source: Turn off VPN for specific websites.
trans-unit.target: Disattiva la VPN per siti web specifici.

trans-unit.source: No more toggling your VPN on and off when you need a site to work. Plus, your preference for the website is saved so you don’t have to adjust it each time.
trans-unit.target: Non dovrai più attivare e disattivare la tua VPN quando hai bisogno di far funzionare un sito. Inoltre, la tua preferenza per il sito web viene salvata in modo da non doverla modificare ogni volta.

trans-unit.source: Get more precise control over how your VPN works when you’re browsing, with the Firefox extension.
trans-unit.target: Ottieni un controllo più preciso sul funzionamento della tua VPN durante la navigazione grazie all’estensione per Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Choose different locations for different websites.
trans-unit.target: Scegli posizioni diverse per i diversi siti web.

trans-unit.source: Browse one site as if you’re in New York and another as if you’re in Paris — all in the same Firefox session.
trans-unit.target: Naviga in un sito come se fossi a New York e in un altro come se fossi a Parigi, il tutto nella stessa sessione di Firefox.

trans-unit.source: Reduces the number of ads you see when you’re using VPN
trans-unit.target: Riduce il numero di annunci visualizzati quando utilizzi la VPN

trans-unit.source: These options may cause some websites to break or not display content correctly.
trans-unit.target: Queste opzioni possono causare il malfunzionamento o la mancata visualizzazione di contenuti in alcuni siti web.

trans-unit.source: Helps protect you from ransomware, phishing, spyware, and viruses
trans-unit.target: Aiuta a proteggerti da ransomware, phishing, spyware e virus

trans-unit.source: Fewer harmful domains will be able to track you
trans-unit.target: Un numero minore di domini dannosi sarà in grado di tracciarti

trans-unit.source: For your security, please sign in again to access your account information. You’ll complete this process on Mozilla’s website.
trans-unit.target: Per motivi di sicurezza, effettua nuovamente l’accesso per accedere alle informazioni del tuo account. Potrai completare questa procedura sul sito web di Mozilla.

trans-unit.source: Help improve Mozilla VPN by sharing crash reports, diagnostics, and product usage data.
trans-unit.target: Aiutaci a migliorare Mozilla VPN condividendo segnalazioni di arresto anomalo, informazioni diagnostiche e dati sull’utilizzo del prodotto.

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will launch and connect when you start up your device
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN verrà aperta e si connetterà all’avvio del dispositivo

trans-unit.note: Startup refers to a device's startup, not the VPN client's.

trans-unit.source: VPN must be restarted to take effect
trans-unit.target: La VPN deve essere riavviata per applicare le modifiche

trans-unit.source: Show or hide the developer options menu
trans-unit.target: Mostra o nascondi il menu Opzioni per gli sviluppatori

trans-unit.source: Staging services are used to test features before they go live to production
trans-unit.target: I servizi di staging vengono utilizzati per testare nuove funzioni prima di andare in produzione

trans-unit.note: Label for a checkbox that, if checked, will show the hidden "system/internal" apps. e.g. "Android Auto" is a system app on Android.
Displays inside the information card at the top of the Excluded apps screen when the VPN is on
trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit Excluded apps
trans-unit.target: La VPN deve essere disattivata per modificare le app escluse

trans-unit.note: Displayed in a notification as "call to action" when apps are missing from the split-tunnel settings.
Displayed in notification after the user added a missing app to the split-tunnel List; %1 is the name of the added application
trans-unit.source: Success! You added “%1” to this list.

trans-unit.note: Apps listed in the split-tunnel settings. %1 is the number of missing apps If necessary, this can be translated as "Apps missing from list :%1"
Label for the date on which the subscription was activated.
Label for the date on which the payment method expires.
The %1 represents the last four digits of a credit card.
Label for the upcoming date on which the subscription will expire.
Label for a button that will take the user to a view where they can manage their subscription.
Label for the upcoming date on which the user will be billed for their subscription.
Headline for a list with information on the payment information the user provided for their subscription.
Label for the selected subscription plan the user currently is subscribed to.
Price for a monthly subscription. %1 represents the localized currency string
Price for a monthly subscription plus tax. %1 represents the localized currency string
Price for a monthly subscription without tax. %1 represents the localized currency string
The %1 represents a localized currency string.
The %1 represents a localized currency string
The %1 represents a localized currency string.
The %1 represents a localized currency string
The %1 represents a localized currency string.
The %1 represents a localized currency string
Menu title for a view with details on the user's account.
Text for a label that indicates an active subscription.
Text for a label that indicates an inactive subscription.
Label for the current status of the subscription.
The %1 represents the subscription platform. Values for %1 could be “Apple” or “Google” for example.
Headline for a list with information on the subscription plan of the user.
Block of text appearing beside a button to upgrade subscription.
trans-unit.target: Risparmia il 50% su un piano annuale

trans-unit.note: Label for a button that will open the upgrade subscription flow.
Location in the systray. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Button label

trans-unit.source: We strive to provide you with choices and collect only the data we need to improve Mozilla VPN. Sharing this data with Mozilla is optional.
trans-unit.target: Ci impegniamo a garantire la tua libertà di scelta e raccogliere solo i dati necessari per migliorare Mozilla VPN. La condivisione di questi dati con Mozilla è facoltativa.

trans-unit.note: Button label

trans-unit.source: Learn more about what data Mozilla collects and how it’s used.
trans-unit.target: Ulteriori informazioni sui dati raccolti da Mozilla e su come vengono utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical, interaction, and campaign and referral data to Mozilla?
trans-unit.target: Consentire a Mozilla VPN di inviare dati tecnici e di interazione, informazioni relative a campagne e referral a Mozilla?

trans-unit.note: Headline of telemetry policy view and checkbox label

trans-unit.source: You currently have the latest version of Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Stai utilizzando la versione più recente di Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Click to update to the latest version of the application
trans-unit.target: Fai clic per aggiornare all’ultima versione dell’applicazione
